Index >  ImageCaptureDriverType >  Native Scan Special Notice

Native Scan Special Notice

Dynamic Web TWAIN Mac Edition provides native scanning support on Mac OS X. With native scan mode, the following properties/methods are not supported:

Basic Scanning

  • BitDepth
  • IfShowUI
  • SelectSource
  • Brightness

Advanced Settings

  • Contrast
  • DefaultSourceName
  • FeedPage
  • GetCustomDSData
  • GetCustomDSDataEx
  • GetDeviceType
  • IfAutoBright
  • IfAutoDiscardBlankpages
  • IfAutoFeed
  • IfAutomaticBorderDetection
  • IfAutomaticDeskew
  • IfAutoScan
  • IfPaperDetectable
  • IfShowIndicator
  • IfUIControllable
  • IfUseTwainDSM
  • PendingXfers
  • PixelFlavor
  • ResetImageLayout
  • RewindPage
  • SetCustomDSData
  • SetCustomDSDataEx
  • SetFileXferInfo
  • SetImageLayout
  • TransferMode
  • XferCount

Uploading & Downloading

  • SaveAllAsMultiPageTIFF
  • SaveAllAsPDF
  • SaveAsBMP
  • SaveAsJPEG
  • SaveAsPDF
  • SaveAsPNG
  • SaveAsTIFF
  • SaveSelectedImagesAsMultiPagePDF
  • SaveSelectedImagesAsMultiPageTIFF
  • LoadImage
  • LoadImageEx
  • FTPDownload
  • FTPDownloadDirectly
  • FTPDownloadEx
  • FTPUpload
  • FTPUploadAllAsMultiPageTIFF
  • FTPUploadAllAsPDF
  • FTPUploadAsMultiPagePDF
  • FTPUploadAsMultiPageTIFF
  • FTPUploadDirectly
  • FTPUploadEx

Runtime Info

  • ImageLayoutDocumentNumber
  • ImageLayoutFrameBottom
  • ImageLayoutFrameLeft
  • ImageLayoutFrameNumber
  • ImageLayoutFrameRight
  • ImageLayoutFrameTop
  • ImageLayoutPageNumber
  • ImagePixelType
  • MagData
  • MagType
  • Duplex
  • IfFeederLoaded

Capability

  • Capability
  • CapCurrentIndex
  • CapCurrentValue
  • CapDefaultIndex
  • CapDefaultValue
  • CapGet
  • CapGetCurrent
  • CapGetDefault
  • CapGetFrameBottom
  • CapGetFrameLeft
  • CapGetFrameRight
  • CapGetFrameTop
  • CapGetHelp
  • CapGetLabel
  • CapGetLabels
  • CapIfSupported
  • CapMaxValue
  • CapMinValue
  • CapNumItems
  • CapReset
  • CapSet
  • CapSetFrame
  • CapStepSize
  • CapType
  • CapValue
  • CapValueString
  • CapValueType
  • GetCapItems
  • GetCapItemsString

  • SetCapItemsString

Encoding & Decoding

  • IfOpenImageWithGDIPlus
